## BaseBackendDTO class

DTO which exposes only READ operations

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare abstract class BaseBackendDTO<Datamodel extends BaseDatamodel> 
```

## Remarks

This class is based on Java DTO. Backend stands for the fact that this class is intended exclusively for consumption as npm package in the backend. see https://www.baeldung.com/java-dto-pattern
